attributes.action: Use of the Golden State Coach in the Diamond Jubilee Procession
attributes.additional_details:
We urge HM Government to advise Her Majesty the Queen to use the Gold State Coach, which has featured in the Silver and Golden Jubilees, so that the occasion may demonstrate a proper display of British pageantry, for which we are known and admired throughout the world.

We believe this is what the majority of people would wish to see to mark The Queen's Diamond Jubilee.
